titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the reduction in the deductible portion of expenses for business meals and entertainment.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the reduction in the deductible portion of expenses for business meals and entertainment.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the income tax deduction for business meals and entertainment expenses from 50% to 80% of such expenses after 2011.
